title: November 9, 2010
content:
Updates: ORAC antioxidants; red meat, cancer risk; berries & the brain; selenium; sleep loss; resveratrol; Monsanto... <!--more--> gangs vs genetic engineering protestors; the economy.
Dr Thomas Levy: board certified cardiologist & a fellow of the American College of Cardiology; he is a leading authority on Vitamin C therapy & other related health issues.
His more recent research has focused on antioxidant balance in the body & the biomechanisms of oxidation leading to disease.
Dr Levy has written six books, including “Curing the Incurable: Vitamin C, Infectious Disease and Toxicity”– with over 1200 scientific references to the research supporting vitamin C’s medical benefits.
